question: Найди конфликты в производственном расписании по перегрузке рабочих центров
sql: SELECT wc.name as work_center, DATE(wo.planned_start_date) as work_date, COUNT(*) as scheduled_orders, SUM(wo.planned_duration_hours) as total_planned_hours, wc.capacity_per_day as daily_capacity_hours, CASE WHEN SUM(wo.planned_duration_hours) > wc.capacity_per_day THEN 'Overloaded' ELSE 'Normal' END as load_status FROM work_centers wc JOIN work_orders wo ON wc.id = wo.work_center_id WHERE wo.planned_start_date >= CURDATE() AND wo.planned_start_date < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND wo.status IN ('planned', 'released') GROUP BY wc.id, wc.name, wc.capacity_per_day, DATE(wo.planned_start_date) HAVING SUM(wo.planned_duration_hours) > wc.capacity_per_day ORDER BY load_status DESC, total_planned_hours DESC;
